title: How Small Contributions Can Grow Your Roth IRA Significantly
subtitle: Discover how adding small amounts to your Roth IRA can lead to substantial savings over time, increasing your financial security for retirement.
content:
Tyler? Yep.

Like you put $6,000 in your Roth IRA at the age of 18? Yep. And now you're ready to retire at the age of 65?

That's worth. No. I added an additional $100 to that account every month.

$1,200 a year won't make that big a difference. Check your numbers.

So that would be... over $766,000?

So just by adding an extra $100 a month, you added over $500,000 to your Roth IRA?

That sounds right. Okay, then you definitely owe us nothing.
